name: big sword fantasy story
description:
Play as Rex NakNak McMegakill, a JRPG character who has found himself stuck in a dungeon. Help him escape by solving puzzles while also managing to lug his unwieldy weapon around. Elbow room is scarce in this dungeon.

Gameplay Intense action combat!


Blatant ripoffs of Pokemon ice gym puzzles!
AAA production spectacle!

Made for HeartJam 2018.
